entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
